00020 #include <stdio.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <errno.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include <syslog.h>
00025 #include <sqlite3.h>
00026 #include "libphonefirewall.h"
00027 
00028 #define ASCII_PERCENT_CHAR 37
00029 
00030 struct Entry *insert_into_list(struct Entry *p_root,
00031                                struct Entry *p_entry)
00032 {
00033         struct Entry *tmp_entry;
00034         if ( NULL == p_root ) {
00035                 if ( NULL == (p_root = (struct Entry *) malloc(sizeof(struct Entry)) ) )
00036                         return NULL;
00037                 p_root->country_code = p_entry->country_code;
00038                 p_root->area_code = p_entry->area_code;
00039                 p_root->number = p_entry->number;
00040                 p_root->name = calloc(1, strlen(p_entry->name));
00041                 strncpy(p_root->name, p_entry->name, strlen(p_entry->name));
00042                 p_root->reason = calloc(1, strlen(p_entry->reason));
00043                 strncpy(p_root->reason, p_entry->reason, strlen(p_entry->reason));
00044                 p_root->next = NULL;
00045                 #if DEBUG
00046                 printf("\n\n[DEBUG]: +%d %d %llu - %s - %s\n", p_root->country_code,
00047                                                                p_root->area_code,
00048                                                                p_root->number,
00049                                                                p_root->name,
00050                                                                p_root->reason);
00051                 #endif
00052         } else {
00053                 tmp_entry = p_root;
00054                 while ( tmp_entry->next != NULL )
00055                         tmp_entry = tmp_entry->next;
00056                 if ( NULL == (tmp_entry->next = (struct Entry *) malloc(sizeof(struct Entry)) ) )
00057                         return NULL;
00058                 tmp_entry = tmp_entry->next;
00059                 tmp_entry->country_code = p_entry->country_code;
00060                 tmp_entry->area_code = p_entry->area_code;
00061                 tmp_entry->number = p_entry->number;
00062                 tmp_entry->name = calloc(1, strlen(p_entry->name));
00063                 strncpy(tmp_entry->name, p_entry->name, strlen(p_entry->name));
00064                 tmp_entry->reason = calloc(1, strlen(p_entry->reason));
00065                 strncpy(tmp_entry->reason, p_entry->reason, strlen(p_entry->reason));
00066                 tmp_entry->next = NULL;
00067                 #if DEBUG
00068                 printf("[DEBUG]: +%d %d %llu - %s - %s\n", tmp_entry->country_code,
00069                                                            tmp_entry->area_code,
00070                                                            tmp_entry->number,
00071                                                            tmp_entry->name,
00072                                                            tmp_entry->reason);
00073                 #endif
00074         }
00075 
00076         return p_root;
00077 }
00078 
00079 struct Entry *find_entry(sqlite3_stmt *pp_stmt)
00080 {
00081         int num_column;
00082         int count;
00083         char *col_name;
00084         char *col_value;
00085         struct Entry *p_entry = (struct Entry *) malloc(sizeof(struct Entry));
00086 
00087         num_column = sqlite3_column_count(pp_stmt);
00088         col_name = sqlite3_malloc(2 * num_column * sizeof(const char *) + 1);
00089 
00090         for ( count = 0; count < num_column; count++ ) {
00091                 col_name = (char *)sqlite3_column_name(pp_stmt, count);
00092                 col_value = (char *)sqlite3_column_text(pp_stmt, count);
00093                 if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_PRIORITY) ) {
00094                         p_entry->priority = atoi(col_value);
00095                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_COUNTRYCODE) ) {
00096                         p_entry->country_code = atoi(col_value);
00097                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_AREACODE) ) {
00098                         p_entry->area_code = atoi(col_value);
00099                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_NUMBER) ) {
00100                         p_entry->number = atoll(col_value);
00101                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_NAME) ) {
00102                         p_entry->name = calloc(1, strlen(col_value));
00103                         strncpy(p_entry->name, col_value, strlen(col_value));
00104                 } else if ( 0 == strcmp(col_name, TB_REASON) ) {
00105                         p_entry->reason = calloc(1, strlen(col_value));
00106                         strncpy(p_entry->reason, col_value, strlen(col_value));
00107                 }
00108         }
00109         return p_entry;
00110 }
00111 
00112 struct Entry *get_entry_by_name(char *name,
00113                                 int listflag)
00114 {
00115         char *listname = (WHITELIST_FLAG == listflag) ? "whitelist" : "blacklist";
00116 
00117         sqlite3 *db;
00118         char stmt[STMT_SIZE];
00119         sqlite3_stmt *pp_stmt = 0;
00120         const char **p_tail = 0;
00121         int rc;
00122         struct Entry *p_root = NULL;
00123         struct Entry *p_entry = NULL;
00124 
00125         rc = sqlite3_open(DB_FILE, &db);
00126 
00127         if ( rc ) {
00128                 syslog(LOG_ERR, "[%s] Can't open database: %s", COMPONENT_NAME, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00129                 sqlite3_close(db);
00130                 return NULL;
00131         }
00132 
00133         sprintf(stmt, "SELECT %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, %4$s, %5$s, %6$s FROM %8$s WHERE %5$s like \'%7$c%9$s%7$c\'", TB_PRIORITY, TB_COUNTRYCODE, TB_AREACODE, TB_NUMBER, TB_NAME, TB_REASON, ASCII_PERCENT_CHAR, listname, name);
00134 
00135         rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, stmt, sizeof(stmt), &pp_stmt, p_tail);
00136 
00137         if ( rc != SQLITE_OK ) {
00138                 syslog(LOG_ERR, "[%s] SQL error: %s", COMPONENT_NAME, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00139                 sqlite3_close(db);
00140                 return NULL;
00141         }
00142 
00143         while ( rc != SQLITE_DONE ) {
00144                 rc = sqlite3_step(pp_stmt);
00145                 if ( SQLITE_ROW == rc ) {
00146                         if ( NULL == (p_entry = find_entry(pp_stmt)) ) break;
00147                         if ( NULL == (p_root = insert_into_list(p_root, p_entry)) ) return NULL;
00148                 }
00149         }
00150         free(p_entry);
00151         sqlite3_close(db);
00152         return p_root;
00153 }
00154 
00155 struct Entry *get_entry_by_number(int country_code,
00156                                   int area_code,
00157                                   unsigned long long number,
00158                                   int listflag)
00159 {
00160         char *listname = (WHITELIST_FLAG == listflag) ? "whitelist" : "blacklist";
00161 
00162         sqlite3 *db;
00163         char stmt[STMT_SIZE];
00164         sqlite3_stmt *pp_stmt = 0;
00165         const char **p_tail = 0;
00166         int rc;
00167         struct Entry *p_root = NULL;
00168         struct Entry *p_entry = NULL;
00169 
00170         rc = sqlite3_open(DB_FILE, &db);
00171 
00172         if ( rc ) {
00173                 syslog(LOG_ERR, "[%s] Can't open database: %s", COMPONENT_NAME, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00174                 sqlite3_close(db);
00175                 return NULL;
00176         }
00177 
00178         sprintf(stmt, "SELECT %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, %4$s, %5$s, %6$s FROM %8$s WHERE %2$s like \'%7$c%9$d%7$c\' AND %3$s like \'%7$c%10$d%7$c\' AND %4$s like \'%7$c%11$llu%7$c\'", TB_PRIORITY, TB_COUNTRYCODE, TB_AREACODE, TB_NUMBER, TB_NAME, TB_REASON, ASCII_PERCENT_CHAR, listname, country_code, area_code, number);
00179 
00180         rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, stmt, sizeof(stmt), &pp_stmt, p_tail);
00181 
00182         if ( rc != SQLITE_OK ) {
00183                 syslog(LOG_ERR, "[%s] SQL error: %s", COMPONENT_NAME, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00184                 sqlite3_close(db);
00185                 return NULL;
00186         }
00187 
00188         while ( rc != SQLITE_DONE ) {
00189                 rc = sqlite3_step(pp_stmt);
00190                 if ( SQLITE_ROW == rc ) {
00191                         if ( NULL == (p_entry = find_entry(pp_stmt)) ) break;
00192                         if ( NULL == (p_root = insert_into_list(p_root, p_entry)) ) return NULL;
00193                 }
00194         }
00195         free(p_entry);
00196         sqlite3_close(db);
00197         return p_root;
00198 }

00200 struct Entry *get_entry_by_reason(char *reason,
00201                                   int listflag)
00202 {
00203         char *listname = (WHITELIST_FLAG == listflag) ? "whitelist" : "blacklist";

00208         const char **p_tail = 0;

00211         struct Entry *p_entry = NULL;
00212

00214 
00215         if ( rc ) {
00216                 syslog(LOG_ERR, "[%s] Can't open database: %s", COMPONENT_NAME, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00217                 sqlite3_close(db);
00218                 return NULL;
00219         }
00220

00222 
00223         rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, stmt, sizeof(stmt), &pp_stmt, p_tail);
00224 
00225         if ( rc != SQLITE_OK ) {
00226                 syslog(LOG_ERR, "[%s] SQL error: %s", COMPONENT_NAME, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00227                 sqlite3_close(db);
00228                 return NULL;
00229         }
00230 
00231         while ( rc != SQLITE_DONE ) {
00232                 rc = sqlite3_step(pp_stmt);
00233                 if ( SQLITE_ROW == rc ) {
00234                         if ( NULL == (p_entry = find_entry(pp_stmt)) ) break;
00235                         if ( NULL == (p_root = insert_into_list(p_root, p_entry)) ) return NULL;
00236                 }
00237         }
00238         free(p_entry);
00239         sqlite3_close(db);
00240         return p_root;
